chunks.text: Business Operations: billing, AP/AR, vendor coordination, admin support, marketing.
Contact Center: multichannel support, order rescue, CSAT and SLA discipline.
IT Support: access, setup, incident handling, simple fixes to keep teams productive.
Professionals On Demand: project-based specialists for analysis, finance, HR, and branding.
Cobertura confiable, comunicación clara, alcances definidos, y participación flexible.
